title: Foundational Career Program
description: A comprehensive start for fresh graduates looking to enter the workforce with confidence. This program covers everything from professional communication to interview preparation, ensuring you're ready to make a strong first impression in the corporate world.

title: Full Stack Developer Pathway
description: Master the MERN stack and build real-world applications from day one. Learn to architect scalable applications, work with databases, and deploy production-ready code. Our hands-on approach ensures you graduate with a portfolio of impressive projects.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description: Learn to lead, sell, and communicate through digital channels. Master the art of creating compelling campaigns, analyzing data, and driving measurable results for businesses of all sizes.

title: Leadership & Management
description: Upskill for the next level of your career with practical leadership training. Learn proven frameworks for team management, strategic decision-making, and organizational leadership.

title: Data Analytics Bootcamp
description: Transform raw data into actionable insights. Learn SQL, Python, and visualization tools to become a data-driven decision maker. Perfect for professionals looking to add analytical skills to their toolkit.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Design beautiful, user-centered digital experiences. Learn industry-standard tools like Figma, understand user research methodologies, and create portfolios that stand out to employers.
